attributes.action: discourage the use of private motor cars and encourage public transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bring in stricter legislation (utilising financial incentives) to motivate motorists to reduce their dependence on cars.  Reward motorists who never exceed speed limits.  Raise the age at which people are permitted to drive to 19 and make the Driving Test more challenging.
